{{Infobox battle item |name = Sharp Beak |image = [[File:Sharp Beak.png]] |caption = In-game image of the ''Sharp Beak''. |location =
*[[Sharp Beak#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} == Description == The '''Sharp Beak''' is a type of held item that can only be equipped to [[File:Flying_Type_icon.png|30px]] Flying type Pokémon. == Details == Raises attack of the Pokémon holding the item by 10%. == Acquisition == ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Items}} {{LootItem|Tin Tower|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Sky Pillar|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Pledge Grove|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Ten Carat Hill|Legendary}} |} |} {{Held Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Held Items]]
